description: Ask your pre-season Brentford questions to BBC Sport
title: Ask your pre-season Brentford questions
title_page: Ask your pre-season Brentford questions to BBC Sport - BBC Sport
maintext:
The 2023-24 Premier League season is edging ever nearer, so what shape are Brentford in before the big kick-off on Sunday, 13 August?
If you send your questions, we will ask our BBC Radio London experts for their thoughts on all things Bees.
